data.text: @BoomBots2 @NJDeptofHealth No it absolutely doesn’t say that at all. I’ve no idea how you’ve take that from what I posted.

@Hicksyfern @NJDeptofHealth The definition basically defines a side effect. 

That essentially says that an AESI is a known side effect so they gave it a separate name.

@BoomBots2 @NJDeptofHealth No they aren’t.

Adverse *reactions* are side effects. Adverse events are not. https://t.co/NHpqa1q4GM
@BoomBots2 @NJDeptofHealth There are not nine pages of side effects. That’s a total misreading of the report. They are AESIs which aren’t remotely the same thing.
@NJDeptofHealth Will you be covering all potential medical costs associated with the 9 pages worth of side effects Pfizer released?
@NJDeptofHealth A sign outside a pediatricians office in VA. https://t.co/neKo5EgUAS
